title: Open, reproducible digital health studies — end to end
text:
momenTUM Research Platform


Open, reproducible digital health studies — end to end
momenTUM is an open research platform for designing and deploying mobile studies, collecting ambulatory assessment data, and exploring results through a web-based dashboard.
It supports reproducible workflows for researchers and a seamless experience for study participants.









Study designer
Define and configure studies using a structured, reproducible specification.


Mobile app
Deliver study protocols to participants on iOS and Android devices.


Dashboard
Inspect and explore collected study data via a web-based interface.


Integrations
Designed to integrate with external systems such as REDCap.





For participants
If you are taking part in a study using the momenTUM platform, install the mobile app and follow the instructions provided by your study team.

Go to Participants →



For researchers
Learn more about the team behind the platform, its institutional context, and current funding.

Team → Funding → Contact →






Funding
momenTUM is supported by the AMBIENT-BD project.
Learn more →

title: Funding
text:
momenTUM is supported by the AMBIENT-BD project.
More information is available on the
AMBIENT-BD project website.

title: Team
text:

title: Participants
text:
During the study
Please follow the instructions provided by your study team.
The app will guide you through questionnaires and tasks according to the study schedule.

title: Participants
text:
Questions or issues?
If you have questions about participation or encounter technical issues, please contact your study team.
You may also reach us at:
chronobiology@sg.tum.de
